alert.note: Alert for Worth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 12:07PM CDT until May 19 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WORTH COUNTY... At 1206 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Northwood, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. At 1150 am, golfball hail was reported 8 miles northeast of Lake Mills. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Northwood and Northwood Municipal. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This is a dangerous storm. Prepare immediately for large destructive hail capable of producing significant damage. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
